entry.title: Inspector general to review postmaster policy orders and ethic complaints

media:group.media:title: Inspector general to review postmaster policy orders and ethic complaints
media:group.media:description:
The Inspector general is reviewing new changes made by postmaster General Louis DeJoy that slowed down mail service by eliminating worker service and hundreds of sorting machines. This comes a day after President Trump said he opposed United States Postal Service funding because he doesn't want to see it used for mail-in voting this November.
#CNN #News

entry.title: USPS warns states it may not be able to deliver ballots in time

media:group.media:title: USPS warns states it may not be able to deliver ballots in time
media:group.media:description:
The US Postal Service is warning states that voters risk not getting their ballots back to election offices in time because of lags in mail delivery, according to letters reviewed by CNN, adding a new level of uncertainty to the coming presidential election and leaving states to ascertain how to adjust.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Trump reveals why he resists funding US postal service

media:group.media:title: Trump reveals why he resists funding US postal service
media:group.media:description:
President Donald Trump acknowledged in order for there to be widespread voting by mail, the United States Postal Services needs more money. Now Trump says he is resisting it and revealed why. He sees it as what could amount to a bargaining chip with Democrats as they are negotiating on Capitol Hill to get another coronavirus legislation bill signed. CNN's Kaitlin Collins reports.
#Trump #USPS #CNN #News

entry.title: Expert: Israel-UAE peace deal won't change much in region

media:group.media:title: Expert: Israel-UAE peace deal won't change much in region
media:group.media:description:
Johns Hopkins School of Advanced International Studies Professor Vali Nasr and former European Union Parliament member Marietje Schaake discuss the impact of a new peace deal struck between Israel and the United Arab Emirates. Israel says it will ​temporarily "suspend​" plans to annex the West Bank, as part of a new peace deal with the UAE. The deal was announced by US President Donald Trump, who told reporters in the Oval Office that he had a "very special call" with leaders from both countries, Israel Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and UAE Crown Prince Mohammed bin Zayed, and that they had agreed to a peace agreement. Trump also tweeted a lengthy joint statement between the US, UAE and Israel, calling the agreement to "full normalization of relations" between Israel and the UAE a "historic diplomatic breakthrough." The UAE and Israel plan to exchange embassies and ambassadors, according to the statement. It will be the third Arab country to open relations with Israel, after Egypt and Jordan
#Amanpour #CNN #News

entry.title: Reporter to Trump: 'Do you regret all the lying to Americans?'

media:group.media:title: Reporter to Trump: 'Do you regret all the lying to Americans?'
media:group.media:description:
The Huffington Post's Senior White House Correspondent S.V. Date tells CNN's Brianna Keilar why he bluntly asked President Donald Trump if he regretted "all of the lying" he had done over the past three years.
#Trump #CNN #News

entry.title: Marge Simpson fires back at Trump adviser's critique of Kamala Harris

media:group.media:title: Marge Simpson fires back at Trump adviser's critique of Kamala Harris
media:group.media:description:
Watch Marge Simpson deliver a direct response to Trump adviser Jenna Ellis saying Kamala Harris sounds like her.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Kushner asked to apologize for Trump spreading birther lie. See his response

media:group.media:title: Kushner asked to apologize for Trump spreading birther lie. See his response
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Christiane Amanpour talks to Jared Kushner about Trump and the recent birtherism attack on presumptive Democratic vice presidential nominee Kamala Harris.
#Amanpour #2020Election #CNN #News

entry.title: Lemon: Guess how many of Harris' GOP colleagues stood up for her?

media:group.media:title: Lemon: Guess how many of Harris' GOP colleagues stood up for her?
media:group.media:description: After President Trump floated a baseless birther theory about Sen. Kamala Harris (D-CA), CNN's Don Lemon said his producers reached out to all 53 of Harris' GOP colleagues in the Senate for comment. #CNN #News

entry.title: Bernie Sanders on USPS: Donald Trump is crazy, not stupid

media:group.media:title: Bernie Sanders on USPS: Donald Trump is crazy, not stupid
media:group.media:description: In an interview with CNN's Anderson Cooper, Sen. Bernie Sanders (D-VT) said President Donald Trump is "crazy, not stupid" when it comes to the plan he told Fox Business about in an interview to withhold funds for USPS over mail-in ballots. #CNN #News

entry.title: Trump claims, without evidence, funding USPS will lead to ballot fraud

media:group.media:title: Trump claims, without evidence, funding USPS will lead to ballot fraud
media:group.media:description: President Donald Trump doubled down on his opposition to giving $25 billion in needed funding to the United States Postal Service in order to block expanded mail-in voting for the election because he believes it will benefit the Democrats. CNN's Kristen Holmes reports this comes as a federal judge gave the Trump campaign one day to produce evidence of vote-by-mail fraud in Pennsylvania, which they claim exists. #CNN #News

entry.title: Trump doesn't refute false Kamala Harris birther theory

media:group.media:title: Trump doesn't refute false Kamala Harris birther theory
media:group.media:description: At a press briefing, Donald Trump did not refute a false birther theory about Senator Kamala Harris (D-CA), telling the reporter who asked about it that he "will take a look." CNN's Jim Acosta called it "a new low" for the president. #Trump #Election2020 #CNN #News

entry.title: Keilar: Instead of trying to provide stability, Trump did this

media:group.media:title: Keilar: Instead of trying to provide stability, Trump did this
media:group.media:description: CNN's Brianna Keiler gives her take on Trump's recent media appearances where he appeared deflated covering various topics from the pandemic to the election. #CNN #News

entry.title: Joe Biden says all governors should mandate masks for 3 months

media:group.media:title: Joe Biden says all governors should mandate masks for 3 months
media:group.media:description:
Presumptive Democratic nominee Joe Biden called for governors to implement mask mandates for the next three months, saying that doing so would save 40,000 Americans' lives. "Every single American should be wearing a mask when they're outside for the next three months as a minimum," the former vice president told reporters after he and his running mate, California Sen. Kamala Harris, received a briefing on the pandemic from public health experts. Wearing masks, he said, "is going to get our kids back to school sooner and safer" and would "get our businesses back long-term." "Look, this is America. Be a patriot," Biden said in a message directed at those resistant to wearing masks. "Protect your fellow citizens. Step up. Do the right thing."
#Biden #CNN #News

entry.title: Doctors baffled by Covid-19 'long hauler' patients

media:group.media:title: Doctors baffled by Covid-19 'long hauler' patients
media:group.media:description: For some patients diagnosed with coronavirus, the symptoms can linger on for months. CNN's Dr. Sanjay Gupta spoke with some of the so-called "long haulers" who are living a nightmare that has medical experts scratching their heads. #CNN #News

entry.title: Why Joe Biden picked Kamala Harris as his VP

media:group.media:title: Why Joe Biden picked Kamala Harris as his VP
media:group.media:description:
Ever since former Vice President Joe Biden announced he would be choosing a woman as his VP candidate, speculation ran rampant about who it would be. In mid-August, just a week ahead of the Democratic National Convention, he announced it would be California Sen. Kamala Harris. Chris Cillizza explains why.
SOURCES AND FURTHER READING: Kamala Harris is Joe Biden's running mate https://www.cnn.com/politics/live-news/2020-election-biden-vp-pick/index.html
Harris confronts Biden over past efforts to block busing https://www.cnn.com/2019/06/28/politics/biden-vs-harris-democratic-debate/index.html
Here's why Joe Biden chose Kamala Harris as his VP https://www.cnn.com/2020/08/11/politics/joe-biden-kamala-harris-vp/index.html
